ing: 1/2 cup reduced-fat sour cream (such as DaisyÂ®)
3 cucumbers, halved lengthwise and thinly sliced crosswise
coarse salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "The recipe for this easy salad came from my grandma, who made it in the summers with fresh dill and cucumbers from her garden."
ins: Mix sour cream, lemon juice, and dill together in a bowl. Add cucumbers and onion; stir to combine. Season with salt and black pepper.
